text: Tekh nechestivykh, kotoryye ne stremilis' sledovat' Istine Allakha, dlya kotorykh ikh sobstvennyye strasti i pokhoti stali religiyey, kotorykh obol'stili uslady blizhney zhizni, teshili yeyo ukrasheniya, i dumali oni, chto yest' tol'ko zemnaya zhizn', zabyvaya o Sudnom dne, kogda predstanut pered Nami, My segodnya - v Sudnyy den' - zabudem ikh, i oni ne voydut v ray i ne budut zhit' v rayskom blazhenstve. Oni budut v ogne, potomu chto oni zabyli pro Sudnyy den' i otritsali Nashi yasnyye znameniya, dokazyvayushchiye istinu
